I would ask them about their daily routines and how they spend their time. This would give me insight into their natural behavior and help me understand how they interact with their environment.

I would ask them about their communication methods and how they convey their needs and wants to other animals or humans. This would help me understand their social structure and how they relate to others.
I would ask them about their emotions and how they express them. This would give me insight into their mental state and help me understand their emotional needs.
I would ask them about their senses and how they perceive the world around them. This would help me understand their perception of reality and how they interact with their environment.
I would ask them about their diet and how they find food. This would give me insight into their hunting and gathering behaviors and help me understand their survival strategies.
